term.name: pantheism
term.source: From Greek pan: all and Greek theos: god.
term.def: The belief that God is the universe and the universe is God - or, more generally, that the universe is divine. While this idea often exists in a "primitive" form (usually called &animism;), it has also been expanded upon philosophically, for example by Spinoza (1632-1677) and in some strains of &hinduism; and &buddhism;.
